Secret Languages

Druidic

Known only to druids. Druids are forbidden from teaching it to non-druids. Contains hidden messages in natural settings.

Thieves' Cant

A secret mix of dialect, jargon, and code used by rogues and criminals. Allows you to hide messages in seemingly normal conversation. Others must succeed on a Wisdom (Insight) check (DC equal to your Charisma (Deception) check) to understand.

Learning Languages

You can learn a new language by spending downtime studying under a tutor or through self-study (typically 250 days of training).
